nodes.text: Stivastin, designated Specimen #71, was a Selkath male who was experimented on by the scientist Gorima during Gorima's efforts to create an Infinite Army by fusing Rakata technology to living beings. Stivastin broke free when Gorima's lab, Genetics Laboratory G-1 on the ocean floor of the planet Manaan, was damaged by missiles and began to flood. He attacked a group of independent operatives and was killed.
